Summary: west direction orange glow at 5000 ft moving west and out of sight
divs: Sighting Detailsmy son's freind was moving his truck to the back of our house. he parked his truck and noticed a light to the west thrugh our back fence. he said the orange light moved up to and to the west pulsed and then he called us to see the light. we came out an looked to the west, did not see anything. we live in west seattle washington and live a mile east of alki point. my son and his freind keep watching to see if thay would any thing more. thay called us out of the house about two minets later. my wife and i saw this ogange glowing object, moving up to the west and we saw a jet fly toward the object (we live in the flight line to sea-tac airport) the jet flew under the object and the object seemed to move away toward the west and fade away. the strang thing we can always hear the jets but there was no sound. to the west of our house is puget sound and then bremerton navel ship yards and banger trident bases.12-24-11
trends: There have been 110 other sightings in Seattle
There were no other sightings in Seattle on or around December 24th 2011
